# vtmn-badge

## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description               | Type                                             | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | ------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------ | ----------- |
| `size`    | `size`    | The size of the badge.    | `"medium" \| "small"`                            | `undefined` |
| `value`   | `value`   | The target of the badge   | `string`                                         | `undefined` |
| `variant` | `variant` | The variant of the badge. | `"accent" \| "brand" \| "default" \| "reversed"` | `undefined` |
